scripts.lint: concurrently "cd backend && npm run lint" "cd frontend && npm run lint"
scripts.lint:fix: cd backend && npm run lint -- --fix || true && cd ../frontend && npm run lint -- --fix || true
scripts.format: concurrently "cd backend && npm run format" "cd frontend && npm run format"
scripts.test: concurrently "cd backend && npm run test" "cd frontend && npm run test"
scripts.test:coverage: concurrently "cd backend && npm run test:coverage" "cd frontend && npm run test:coverage"
scripts.production: npm run format && npm run test && npm run lint:fix && npm run build && npm run sonar
